channel.title: Cloud Service on Teccelarate – IT Consultation Service
channel.description: Recent content in Cloud Service on Teccelarate – IT Consultation Service

item.title: Cloud Services
item.description: • Migration Assessment: assess existing applications, infrastructure, and workloads to determine the feasibility and readiness for migration to the cloud. • Strategy and Planning: help businesses develop a comprehensive cloud migration strategy, including selecting the appropriate cloud platform and determining the most suitable migration approach (lift and shift, re-platforming, or refactoring). • Application and Data Migration: assist in migrating applications and data from on-premises environments or other cloud platforms to the target cloud infrastructure.
